weekly_top_story.headline: China’s president meets visiting Russian PM Mikhail Mishustin in Beijing, calling it a ‘strategic choice’ for China to deepen ties with Russia
weekly_top_story.summary: China and Russia reaffirmed their strategic partnership amid growing global tensions, signaling a shift in geopolitical alliances and potential impacts on international trade and security.

stories.headline: Chinese team creates world’s first 2D industrial chip for military use
stories.summary: A breakthrough in semiconductor technology could revolutionize military and industrial applications, highlighting China’s rapid advancements in high-tech manufacturing.

stories.headline: Successful test flight by China of a new, heavy-duty helicopter drone
stories.summary: China’s successful test of a heavy-duty helicopter drone marks a significant leap in unmanned aerial technology, with potential implications for both civilian and military sectors.

stories.headline: Dodgers win Game 7 to clinch back-to-back World Series titles
stories.summary: The Los Angeles Dodgers’ victory in the World Series highlights the global popularity of baseball and the cultural significance of major sporting events.
